desc: We are a globally established Media coverage Company (see [url removed, login to view]) providing full video coverage services including creative, live streaming and post production solutions to companies and events worldwide. Valoso is established across 7 countries; USA, Australia, New Zealand, UK, Germany, Taiwan and Macedonia and we have been operating successfully for 3 years.We are looking for highly experienced videographers, drone operators and live streaming technician for two events and 3 commercial shoots on the North Island. Everything happens in October and November.For commercial shoots, you will need to have prior experience within advertising, film making or commercial industry.Location for shoots: Lake Waikaremoana, Reporoa, Mangere (outdoor)Need Videographers and Drone operators for these shoots.2 hour shoots.For events, you would have to have prior experience covering conferences and tech events.Location for events: Auckland and Rotorua (indoor)Need Videographer and live streaming technician for these events.10 hour eventsSpecific Req for each position:- Videographer (tripod, dolly, Sony FS7 (preferred), audio and lightning kits)- Drone operator (license, DJI)- Live stream technician (You need to be able to stream Full HD via LAN connection with the following speeds: Upload: 10mbps, Download: 20mbps, Bandwidth: 100mbps. Needs to have experience in multi cam streaming at previous events)To be considered please provide answers to the following:What kind of equipment do you use?Provide three references and sample work.Where are you based?Availability?What is your hourly rate, full day rate and half day rate?Thank you!
title: PRO videographers, drone operators and live streaming technicians needed for several big projects

desc: I have a video course I need created that is 3 hours and 16 minutes long.The course is on how to trade stock options and I am seeking a whiteboard specialist to pull it all together. The project is broken up into shorter videos that will range from about 5 to 10 minutes, a couple shorter and a couple longer.I will provide the script, the voiceover, prototype drawings of important things to draw, a few images, and some video to incorporate. I need you to create an entertaining, but informative presentation.   It is going to be key that you can draw good looking graph that are flexible based on the situation. If you cannot make good looking graphs or are limited to what is in the software library this is not the project for you. For example, if you’re just using VideoScribe or PowToons and are limited by only what is in these product library’s do not bother biding.I hired someone to create this already and they skipped out on me, so looking for someone to pick up where they left off.Here is a link to their work, which I think is really good.[url removed, login to view]I do not need the quality to be necessarily this high, but still looking for something good. This was done in Camtasia, After Effects and ToomBoom.The problem with this project is that it’s on a challenging topic, so I will provide another whiteboard course on this topic so you can see what it’s going to take and understand stock options yourself.I am also seeking long term relationship for future projects. If we can create a relationship I will be funneling a lot of work to you. I want to ensure this will be a fruitful relationship for both of us.If you’re interested, please be sure to send me examples of previous work that you have done that you envision for this project. Please do not send me a whole list of links to other types of work, like 3d animation or anything other than whiteboard work.Please leave a bid for the project, at least a ballpark figure that can be adjusted later. If you use a placeholder bid or a price per hour I will just have to move on.
title: 3 Hour Whiteboard Explainer Video

The video would have to be about a minute long.Please confirm if this would be within the scope of your services or not. This is a quite urgent requirement and we would need the animated video by 12th September. There are a few things in the vehicle model like engine and pumps(black colored and in the center) which are a very complex shape but do not require that level of detail in the video. We can discuss further simplifications required if and once you accept the project.We can discuss any details over chat.

desc: About us:  Sales for Life ([url removed, login to view]) is a leading global education training company that has provided sales training solutions to thousands of sales professionals around the world, from startups to Fortune 500 companies.What we are looking for: We are building a team of offshore motion graphic designers right now.If you are selected for this position, your job would be to take our existing live action videos and add motion graphics to it with a goal to:1. Enhance the overall value of the video;2. Make it more engaging and;3. Help us connect with our audience at an emotional level.Duties & Responsibilities1. Videos would be shoot on a green screen and you would have to remove the green screen and color correct the video.  Replace the background of the video with a picture or an another video depending on the context.2. Add words, small sentences or pictures around the live instructor.3. Add a banner on the bottom part or the top part of the screen.4. Replace the live person screen with animated motion graphics (Ideally the duration of this kind of motion graphics should not be more than 10 seconds, however, you can definitely increase this duration if you think it will improve the level of understanding of the video.The Future ScopeWe need to produce thousands of videos and this would be a continuous job.There is also a possibility of a full-time position if you perform well.This job post is for a paid test project. We will pay you on an hourly basis for this test project. Please indicate you hourly price in the cover letter.We will give you a small 30-60 seconds sample video and you would have to add motion graphics to it to improve the overall value of the video.  You are free to use the above 4 points or add your own creativity.  Remember the goal:  to enhance the value of the video and to make it more engaging.CommunicationAll communication is via v[The Administrator removed this message for containing contacts details which breaches our Terms of Service] communication is not enough.  If you prefer to only communicate by email, this position is not for you and please do not apply.Next StepsPlease apply for this position with your portfolio of motion graphics work and include a cover letter explaining why you’d be a good fit for our company.We look forward to hearing from you; best of luck on your journey!
title: Hiring after effects artists to add motion graphics to live videos
